data.title: CHANNEL: THE WORLD ACCORDING TO JOHN GARDNER
data.meta_description: JOHN GARDNER     In an interview I did with writer John Gardner on January  21, 1973, he made one of the most thought-provoking and  proph...
data.text: The E-Channel presents the words and wisdom of the writer Charles Johnson. It's Charles Johnson LIVE ! It was created by E. Ethelbert Miller (that's what the E stands for) in January 2011. It's a one year project in which Miller will interview Johnson about his books, beliefs, and various matters of the heart and mind. The E-Channel presents Johnson's own voice. Every word is his. They are responses to questions asked each week by Miller.
